1111001011110011 1100101001011000 1 -> sum: 1011110101001100, cout: 1
0100001100011010 0000111001100010 0 -> sum: 0101000101111100, cout: 0
1111110111101111 1110101000100110 0 -> sum: 1110100000010101, cout: 1
1100101000001001 1110010011101110 1 -> sum: 1010111011111000, cout: 1
1100101011111011 1111000011110111 0 -> sum: 1011101111110010, cout: 1
0111110101001111 0110100100110010 1 -> sum: 1110011010000010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
